snippet: Security experts said they had discovered what they believed was the fourth state-sponsored computer virus to surface in the Middle East in three years.
abstract: Security experts said they had discovered what they believed was the fourth state-sponsored computer virus to surface in the Middle East in three years.

headline.main: Virus Seeking Bank Data Is Tied to Attack on Iran
headline.print_headline: Computer Virus Is Aimed at Banks in Lebanon, Security Firm Says
